dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: "We want to make money so we can give it away." From the beginning, we set aside 10% of our profits for giving back to those in need.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Creating a nonprofit allowed us to better steward our giving and contribute in ways we couldn't as a business.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Many employees joined Liferay because they believed in our vision of giving back. This was an opportunity to live out that vision. During our EVP's inaugural year, our US and Spain employees were able to participate. By year end, 9 employees participated in service trips, and 9 made grant requests – great start!

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Some highlights: 1) First group service trip! A team of 3 employees went to New Orleans to help with Hurricane Katrina relief, 2) Service surges! Almost 4 times as many employees used service hours in comparison to 2010, 3) Giving grows! 2 times as many employees made grant requests in comparison to 2010

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: As Liferay, Inc., we create jobs and volunteer our time to serve. As Liferay Foundation, we financially support efforts we believe in and partner with other organizations that are making a difference. In our local communities, we get to know people and build relationships that last. In that sweet spot, we can best show our communities that Liferay cares. Through EVP, our focus is to continually build these communities world-wide.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: Since 2010, over 4500 service hours used (more than 6 months of time!) and over $50,000 donated to charities. Numerous trips all over the world devoted to activities such as disaster relief and rebuilding, using Liferay skills to help nonprofits, building houses for those in need, providing basic health and education, and spending time with underprivileged children and those with special needs.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: We rolled out EVP in our Germany, Brazil, and China offices. Also, the EVP site was launched to handle all service and grant requests.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: From theory to practice – we saw long term communities and partnerships forming in Japan, China, Brazil, and LA. We also created many more pre-planned service opportunities to further assist employees who were looking for service opportunities.

dynamic-element.name: timeline_event_description
dynamic-element.dynamic-content: EVP was made available to all Liferay employees world-wide! Also, the EVP site was re-launched to better capture the spirit of EVP and everything that makes it so special.
